conclusion: Area of coil ABCO is 0.4 m², magnetic field B is 0.1 T in the positive x-direction, coil rotates 60° downward around the z-axis
Initial angle θ₁ between magnetic field and normal to coil is 90°
Initial magnetic flux Φ₁ is 0 Wb
Final angle θ₂ between magnetic field and normal to coil is 30°
Final magnetic flux Φ₂ is 0.03464 Wb
Change in magnetic flux ΔΦ is 0.03464 Wb
